source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_SEQ_00<tab>Montblanc is eager to return to the <var 1A 02 /var>Prima Vista<var 1A 01 /var> and report on your findings.
target: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_SEQ_00<tab>クガネ・ランディングのモンブランは、取引の件をみなに報告したいようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_SEQ_01<tab>How Montblanc made it back to the tiring room before you did is a mystery best left unsolved.
target: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_SEQ_01<tab>モンブランは、劇場艇に戻っていった。大道具部屋の「ラムザ・レクセンテール」と話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_SEQ_02<tab>Despite little chance for success, you contact several of your closest companions and present them with Fran's demands. To your surprise, Hancock replies almost immediately and summons you to the Ruby Bazaar to discuss business.
target: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_SEQ_02<tab>ハンコックから、援助の件について連絡がきた。大道具部屋の「リナ・ミュリラー」と話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_SEQ_03<tab>While Lina seems enthusiastic enough, you, on the other hand, are not as optimistic as the reporter as to how this will all play out.
target: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_SEQ_03<tab>リナは、さっそくウルダハ商館へ向かいたいようだ。クガネ・ランディングの「ブワジ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_SEQ_04<tab>Bwagi insists that he accompany you to the Ruby Bazaar. It is almost as if he knows something you do not.
target: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_SEQ_04<tab>ブワジと話した。クガネのウルダハ商館付近で「リナ・ミュリラー」と話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_SEQ_05<tab>For reasons each their own, the East Aldenard Trading Company, the Eorzean Alliance, and Lord Hien all refuse to meet the demands of the Dalmascan resistance. According to Bwagi, however, this is exactly what Fran expected, and the Bangaa says as much before trotting off back to his airship.
target: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_SEQ_05<tab>フランは、申し出が断られることを予想していたようだった。劇場艇プリマビスタの大道具部屋に戻り、ジェノミス・レクセンテールに結果を報告しよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_SEQ_06<tab>Disappointed that your efforts have been for naught, you regroup with your companions to decide a new plan of action. It is at this time the Lady Fran appears, explaining that the leader of Lente's Tears has commanded her to guide you to the Orbonne Monastery. However, before you can depart, Alma is possessed by the Otius and drawn into a dark portal of unknown origin. To save her, you must finally journey to the Golmore Jungle.
target: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_SEQ_06<tab>アルマが聖石オティスに支配され、何処かへと連れ去られていってしまった。フランからもたらされた情報をもとに、一刻もはやくゴルモア大密林へと向かわねばならない。大道具部屋の「ラムザ・レクセンテール」と話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_SEQ_07<tab>Mikoto's device allows Ramza to free his sister from Ultima's portal, but cannot stop Ramza from being swallowed by the magicked rift. Jenomis will not be pleased with the day's results.
target: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_SEQ_07<tab>ミコトが設計した魔道具により、アルマを救い出すことには成功したものの、今度はラムザが連れ去られてしまった。大道具部屋の「ジェノミス・レクセンテール」と話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_SEQ_08<tab>Jenomis is in shock at the loss of his only son. There must be some means of saving the boy, but for now, you must wait.
target: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_SEQ_08<tab>ジェノミスも、ショックを隠せないようだ。ラムザを救い出す手立てを考えねばならない。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_BWAGI_500_000<tab>Do not be put off by Lady Fran. The general has quite the edge to her, but it is only because she wants what is best for the resistance.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_BWAGI_500_000姐さん、きっついお方だが、気を悪くしないでクレ！
レジスタンスを立て直そうと必死なのサ……。
マァ、とにかくオレたちはここで待ってるヨ。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_GIJUK_500_005<tab>I've finally come to accept Ba'Gamnan is gone for good, but I will never forget how he met his end. I cannot allow my hatred to consume me as it did him.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_GIJUK_500_005オレたちゃ、バッガモナン兄貴のこと……
もう気にしてないからサ……アンタももう忘れてクレヨ……。
兄貴は心の闇に飲み込まれちマッタが、その想いはオレが……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_RINOK_500_010<tab>Fran is not too bad, once you're on her good side─her only good side being her backside...but you didn't hear that from me.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_RINOK_500_010姐さん、ああ見えても案外優しいお方なんだヨ。
仲間思いだし、気配りもうまい……。
もちろん、戦士としての腕は一流だけどネ。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_MONTBLANC_000_000<tab>Hurry, hurry! If I don't tell someone of our adventure quick, I'll positively burst, kupo!
target: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_MONTBLANC_000_000<tab>とりあえず、一旦、劇場艇へ戻って報告するクポ～～！

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_040<tab>This woman asks much of us...
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_040なるほど……。
ですが、その申し出はボクらでは如何ともし難く……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_041<tab>The Viera have ever been wary of outsiders. For centuries their many tribes have remained hidden in the jungles, content with their self-imposed solitude.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_041ゴルモア大密林に暮らすヴィエラは「森の民」と呼ばれており、
旧ダルマスカ王国の支配下であってもその法から除外された、
いわば独自の自治権を有した者たちだという。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_042<tab>Each tribe has its own strict code and will mete swift punishment to any who would defy these laws. As such, many a Viera will spend her entire life bound to the territory of her ancestors, both unwilling and unable to venture beyond its borders.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_042ジャングルに点在する集落ごとに定められた厳格な掟を守り、
大半のヴィエラは森から出ることなく一生を終えるとか。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_043<tab>And while the tribes are wholly independent, they have agreed to uphold a single standard: shun all contact with the outside world unless it is to protect the jungle.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_043集落、すなわち部族ごとに掟の細部は異なるがその根幹は一緒。
「外界との接触を断つ」「森の護人（もりびと）として生きる」、
このふたつのルールをどの部族も守っているというわけだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_044<tab>That said, with every generation there are those Viera who long for a life beyond the verdant sea of trees and abandon their tribes to start a new life in the kingdom's cities. My guess is that this Fran is one such individual.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_044もっとも、そうした掟に縛られることなく、集落を捨て、
王国民として暮らすヴィエラもこの百年でかなり増えたと聞く。
フランと名乗る女性もそうした者のひとりだろうね。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_MONTBLANC_000_045<tab>Who also happens to be the <var 1A 02 /var>only<var 1A 01 /var> individual we know who can guide us to the monastery, kupo!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_MONTBLANC_000_045フランさんは「オーボンヌ修道院」がどの遺跡なのか、
知っているみたいクポ！
なにがなんでもフランさんの協力を得たいクポ！！

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_LINAMEWRILAH_000_046<tab>It seems <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>'s sword arm won't be enough to see us through this predicament. <var 08 E905 ((She'll)) ((He'll)) /var> need to don the right mantle of a diplomat if we're to convince the alliances and the East Aldenard Trading Company to grant us aid. What could go wrong!?
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_LINAMEWRILAH_000_046いずれにしても、難しいミッションね。
ま、冒険者さんは腕力だけじゃなくて、人徳もあるから、
きっとうまくいきますよ！　ね！

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_HANCOCK_000_047<tab>(-Hancock-)Yes, yes, I know you said not to call unless it was urgent, but this is urgent. All right, not exactly, but my superiors have come to a decision on your request, and I thought you might want to hear what they had to say.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_HANCOCK_000_047(-ハンコック-)最終結論ではありませんが、
ご依頼の件に対する一定の回答を用意致しまシタ！

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_HANCOCK_000_048<tab>(-Hancock-)Oh, and let me preempt any request for immediate disclosure with a reminder that the information is <var 1A 02 /var>much<var 1A 01 /var> too sensitive to discuss over linkpearl. Meet me at the Ruby Bazaar posthaste and I shall duly apprise you of their judgment.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_HANCOCK_000_048(-ハンコック-)お手数ですが、クガネのウルダハ商館へおいでください！
皆さん、至急、こちらへ向かってくれるとのことデス！

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_LINAMEWRILAH_000_049<tab>Well then, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. What are we waiting for?
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_LINAMEWRILAH_000_049お供しますよ！
私も事の顛末が気になりますからね！

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_LINAMEWRILAH_000_080<tab>I've read about how you united the whole of Eorzea under a single standard and convinced the Holy See to end a thousand-year conflict. Compared to that, asking for a few soldiers and a coffer or three of gil should be a piece of rolanberry cake!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_LINAMEWRILAH_000_080さぁ、クガネのウルダハ商館に向かいましょうか！
冒険者さんの営業力？　いや、政治力？
ちょっと楽しみです！

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_LINAMEWRILAH_000_081<tab>Ah, I suppose we should inform Bwagi down at Kugane Landing of our progress. You mentioned he was to keep an eye on us.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_LINAMEWRILAH_000_081あ、その前にブワジさんにも報告を入れましょうか。
ウルダハ商館の前に、まずはクガネ・ランディングですね！

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_LINAMEWRILAH_000_085<tab>I've informed Bwagi of our situation. We are ready to make for the Ruby Bazaar when you are.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_LINAMEWRILAH_000_085さぁ、ブワジさんに報告を入れて、
ウルダハ商館へ急ぎましょう！

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_BWAGI_000_090<tab>So you've an answer from East Aldenard already. Impressive. It would seem the Lady Fran has underestimated your influence amongst the realm's players. I assume you have no objections to me joining you then.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_BWAGI_000_090そうか、段取りは整ったってワケか。
なら、このオレも同行するとしよう。
……悪いが、嫌だと言っても付いていくぞ。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_GIJUK_500_030<tab>Rinok and I will stay here with the airship. Our last foray into the city was met with one too many cold stares for my liking.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_GIJUK_500_030オレたちゃ、ここで留守番してるゼ。
バンガがクガネをうろうろしてもろくな事ァないからナ！
じゃ、しっかりやってクンロ！

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_RINOK_500_035<tab>Vessels such as ours require extensive maintenance to remain skyworthy. You and Bwagi take as long as you need.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_RINOK_500_035飛空艇の整備でもしとくかネェ……。
燃料と消耗品を調達しときたいところだけど、
クガネじゃ目立ちすぎるもんネェ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_BWAGI_500_040<tab>Whenever you are ready, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_BWAGI_500_040はてさて……鬼が出るか蛇が出るか……。
毒を食らわばなんとやらってヤツだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_LINAMEWRILAH_000_100<tab>Hancock awaits us in the Bazaar. Shall we, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_LINAMEWRILAH_000_100「ウルダハ商館応接室」でハンコックさんがお待ちだそうですよ！
早速、中へ入りましょうか？

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_Q3_000_000<tab>Enter the Ruby Bazaar?
target: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_Q3_000_000<tab>「ウルダハ商館応接室」へ移動しますか？

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_HANCOCK_000_150<tab>A lovely lady and a...Bangaa? And here I was expecting you would be alone, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_HANCOCK_000_150これはまた珍しい……。
貴方様はダルマスカのバンガ族ですね……？
劇場艇に出入りしているバンガ族がいると噂には聞いてましたが。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_HANCOCK_000_151<tab>Ah, but excuse my manners. I am Hancock, representative of the East Aldenard Trading Company assigned to oversee her assets here in Kugane. It is a pleasure to meet you.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_HANCOCK_000_151あ、これはまたとんだ失礼を……。
私、東アルデナード商会のクガネの代表を務めておりマス、
ハンコックと申す者……以後、お見知りおきを。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_YUGIRI_000_152<tab>And I am Yugiri. We apologize for making you come all this way.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_YUGIRI_000_152)) (( )) 02 /var>殿、ブワジ殿、
お待たせしてしまい申し訳ない。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_TATARU_000_153<tab>Not that it is far from the landing to─ Ahem.
target: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_TATARU_000_153<tab>お待たせしましたでっす。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_YUGIRI_000_154<tab>Bwagi, was it? I serve Lord Hien, rightful ruler of Doma. I have come bearing our nation's reply to your entreaty.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_YUGIRI_000_154ブワジ殿、お初にお目にかかる。
私はドマ国君主・ヒエン様の家人のひとり、ユウギリと申す者。
東方連合よりの返答を持って参りました。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_YUGIRI_100_154<tab>Bwagi, was it? I serve Lord Hien, rightful ruler of Doma. I have come bearing my lord's reply to your entreaty.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_YUGIRI_100_154ブワジ殿、お初にお目にかかる。
私はドマ国君主・ヒエン様の家人のひとり、ユウギリと申す者。
ドマよりの返答を持って参りました。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_TATARU_000_155<tab>And I am Tataru Taru of the Scions of the Seventh Dawn. I'm only here seeing as no one else could be bothered. Well, that and to bear a message from the leaders of the Eorzean Alliance.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_TATARU_000_155私はタタルでっす！
「暁の血盟」の……じ、事務処理を任せられている者でっす！
エオルゼア同盟軍の返答を持って来ましたでっす！！

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_BWAGI_000_156<tab>Thank you both for coming. I am Bwagi, formerly of the Dalmascan Royal Fusiliers. I now claim allegiance to Lente's Tears─a resistance group seeking to accomplish what you have in Doma and Ala Mhigo.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_BWAGI_000_156(-ブワジ-)オレはブワジ……。
ダルマスカのレジスタンス「レンテの涙」のモンだ。
このクガネじゃ、珍しいツラかもしれんが慣れてクレ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_BWAGI_000_157<tab>What tidings have you brought us?
target: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_BWAGI_000_157<tab>(-ブワジ-)……早速で悪いが、話を聞かせてもらえるカナ？

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_HANCOCK_000_158<tab>Allow me to begin then. While the East Aldenard Trading Company sympathizes with your plight, we are not in a position to grant you the funding you seek.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_HANCOCK_000_158……その件なんですがね、
結論から申し上げると、我が東アルデナード商会としては、
「レンテの涙」に資金援助することはできまセ～ン。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_HANCOCK_000_159<tab>As you are aware, the East Aldenard Trading Company prides itself in its neutrality, be it in matters political or personal.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_HANCOCK_000_159ご存じのとおり、東アルデナード商会は、
このひんがしの国と同様に「中立」をモットーとしておりマス。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_HANCOCK_000_160<tab>And what of our relationship with the Eorzean Alliance? Ah...yes. What I meant to say was, <var 1A 02 /var>here in Hingashi<var 1A 01 /var>, the East Aldenard Trading Company prides itself in its neutrality, be it in matters political and...er...
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_HANCOCK_000_160もちろん、エオルゼア同盟軍には与する立場ではございますが、
少なくともこの地において帝国とは中立……といえないまでも、
刺激を与える立場にはなりたくありません！

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_HANCOCK_000_161<tab>You must understand our position. Simply supplying coin to any one group would make it appear that we somehow favor that group over another. Seeing as we conduct business openly and fairly with <var 1A 02 /var>everyone<var 1A 01 /var>, doing such would be sending the wrong message, and ultimately harm profits. Yes.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_HANCOCK_000_161商売ならともかく、ただの資金援助となりマスと、
それはもう帝国に反旗を翻すようなもの……
残念ながらお力添えできないというのが返答にございマス。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_LINAMEWRILAH_000_162<tab>And by selling to both sides, you maximize profits while good men and women perish. How convenient!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_LINAMEWRILAH_000_162そ、そんなぁ～。
それじゃあ、困るんですけど～～ぉ！

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_HANCOCK_000_163<tab>We are a <var 1A 02 /var>business<var 1A 01 /var>, milady. We do what we must to survive. That does not mean, however, we are blind to the needs of our customers or our allies, which is why we support the Eorzean Alliance and their noble efforts to safeguard their realm's freedom through a <var 1A 02 /var>mutually beneficial<var 1A 01 /var> arrangement.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_HANCOCK_000_163我が商会がエオルゼア同盟軍に与するのは、
その志に対して大いに共感するものの、あくまでも商売……！
与することが利益になると考えるからこその協力なのデス。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_HANCOCK_000_164<tab>If it were my choice, I would provide your little resistance with all the funding it needs, but as my good friend, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, knows all too well, it is not <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> choice.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_HANCOCK_000_164それは解放者様とて、よくよくおわかりのハズ……。
個人としては皆様のお力になりたいと、心からそう願いマスが、
私の立場としては……心中お察しくださいマセ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_TATARU_000_165<tab>Well, now that Hancock's thoroughly lowered your spirits, you won't be as crestfallen when I inform you the Eorzean Alliance will also be unable to provide any assistance.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_TATARU_000_165あの～～、とっても言いにくいのですが……
「暁の血盟」の主だった賢人さんたちは、現在……多忙で……
実は結論を出せない状態なのでっす……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_BWAGI_000_166<tab>And let me guess, you did everything in your power to try and convince the leaders of each city-state, only to watch as they politely declined our proposal, claiming an unfortunate lack of intelligence or resources.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_BWAGI_000_166(-ブワジ-)それでもお嬢ちゃんは一生懸命、各国代表に協力を仰いだが、
情報不足の状況じゃ、各国共に動けずってところカナ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_TATARU_000_167<tab>Wait, how did you─!?
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_TATARU_000_167ど、どうして、それがわかるのでっす！？
ブ、ブワジさん、千里眼か何かでっす？？？

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_YUGIRI_000_175<tab>Lord Hien sends his greetings to you and yours. Having recently found strength through a newly formed alliance with our neighboring nations, Doma is open to further welcoming like-minded organizations. This includes our Dalmascan brothers and sisters still suffering under the imperial yoke.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_YUGIRI_000_175……我がドマが中心となって周辺諸国と共に作った東方連合、
ここにダルマスカ解放を望むレジスタンスの皆様も、
是非とも参加していただきたい……というのが主の回答です。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_YUGIRI_000_180<tab>Lord Hien sends his greetings to you and yours, and under normal circumstances would welcome allies still suffering under the imperial yoke.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_YUGIRI_000_180……いつ帝国が再侵攻してくるかはわからない、
軍事支援を通してレジスタンスと関係を持てるのは、
ドマとしてもありがたい……というのが主の回答です。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_YUGIRI_000_185<tab>However, word has it that the latest attempt at reclaiming your kingdom ended in failure, resulting in the loss of countless lives, including many of the resistance's leaders.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_YUGIRI_000_185ですが、先日のラバナスタでの粛正を受け、
ダルマスカ解放軍は壊滅状態にあると聞き及んでおります。
多くの戦士は死傷し、指揮系統は完全に消失……と。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_BWAGI_000_186<tab>You are not mistaken. Our army is not what it once was. Those remaining have been forced to take refuge deep beneath the streets of Rabanastre.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_BWAGI_000_186(-ブワジ-)ああ、残念だが、そのとおりダ。
今は、生き残った者たちが地下に潜り、
再びチャンスが訪れるのを待っているってところダナ。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_YUGIRI_000_187<tab>The IVth Legion has already defeated you once. Lacking unity and leadership, the current resistance will not survive another tilt against the Empire's disciplined ranks.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_YUGIRI_000_187ダルマスカを占領する第IV軍団は精鋭の敵……
奴らと本気で戦いたいのであれば、分裂したグループをひとつに、
ダルマスカ解放軍として一枚岩の組織に、それが肝要かと。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_YUGIRI_000_188<tab>If Doma is to join hands with Dalmasca as an ally, you must first prove to us that you will stand as one.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_YUGIRI_000_188我らとて帝国と対峙する身なれば、
戦力をおいそれと分散することはできませぬ。
それはおわかりでございましょう。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_BWAGI_000_195<tab>Doma as a full-fledged ally <var 1A 02 /var>would<var 1A 01 /var> serve far better to strengthening our cause than a few temporary soldiers.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_BWAGI_000_195(-ブワジ-)……なァるほど。
小規模なレジスタンスグループなら支援ではなく、
いっそのこと東方連合に加えた方が手っ取り早いモンな……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_BWAGI_000_200<tab>Doma as a full-fledged ally <var 1A 02 /var>would<var 1A 01 /var> serve far better to strengthening our cause than a few temporary soldiers.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_BWAGI_000_200(-ブワジ-)……なァるほど。
小規模なレジスタンスグループなら支援ではなく、
いっそのことドマ軍に加えた方が手っ取り早いモンな……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_YUGIRI_000_205<tab>Yet even if we were able to wrest Dalmasca from the Empire's grasp, without unity amongst your people, the resulting chaos could prove even more perilous to the kingdom.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_YUGIRI_000_205ですが、それではダルマスカ解放を望む皆様の真意、
その志を反映した戦いになるのか否や。
まして、帝国からの解放のあとは……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_BWAGI_000_206<tab>You understand much of our situation.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_BWAGI_000_206(-ブワジ-)戦後処理のことまで心配してくれるンかい？
帝国を追い出したあと、その主権をめぐってグループ同士が争う、
……たしかに今のままだとその可能性は高いナ。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_BWAGI_000_207<tab>And based on that understanding, you would refuse your aid to Lente's Tears, am I correct?
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_BWAGI_000_207(-ブワジ-)いわんや、その危険性を予見するが故に、
いちグループに対してのみの支援はできンと、
アンタたちはそう言いたいわけダ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_YUGIRI_000_208<tab>Do not mistake me. Lord Hien's refusal is but a message─a message to help you plan your next step.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_YUGIRI_000_208ブワジ殿、気を悪くしたならば何卒ご容赦を……。
ただ、ヒエン様の真意もご理解くださいませ。
我らドマとて、民がそれを願ったからこそ、事を成せたのです！

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_BWAGI_000_209<tab>You have a wise master. He understands that without proper planning, driving one enemy from your midst simply creates room for the next.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_BWAGI_000_209(-ブワジ-)イヤイヤ、アンタの言うとおりダゼ！
他国の力を借りて帝国を追い出したとしても、それは一時の話。
まずは足元を固め、解放軍を再興してこその未来っテナ！

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_BWAGI_000_210<tab>Lady Fran will no doubt be pleased to hear that your response was <var 1A 02 /var>exactly<var 1A 01 /var> what she expected.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_BWAGI_000_210(-ブワジ-)いや、実は、すべて姐さんの……
フラン姐さんの予想どおりの展開ダゼ。
姐さん、やっぱすごいぜ、全部お見通しなんだからナァ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_LINAMEWRILAH_000_211<tab>You knew this whole time that your demands would be rejected, yet still you let this farce play out?
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_LINAMEWRILAH_000_211どういうことです？
全部、断られるのをわかった上での申し出……ってことですか？
いったいなんで、そんなことを！？

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_BWAGI_000_212<tab>You have my apologies, but this was all necessary to prove an important point to our leader.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_BWAGI_000_212(-ブワジ-)リーダーの命令を……無駄だとわかっていても、
その「純な願い」を無礙にはできなかったのサ、姐さんは……。
だが、マズいことになったナ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_BWAGI_000_213<tab>Lady Fran needed to show the princess just exactly what she was getting herself into, and your honesty today will serve us better than any hollow promise. Thank you.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_BWAGI_000_213(-ブワジ-)アンタらを試すようなマネをしちまって、ホント、スマネェ。
とにかく、オレはこのことを姐さんに急ぎ伝えることにしよう。
それじゃあ、アバヨ！

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_LINAMEWRILAH_000_214<tab>Wait! What about the Golmore Jungle!?
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_LINAMEWRILAH_000_214ちょ、ちょっと待ってくださいよ～！
ゴルモア大密林の案内の件、どうなっちゃうんです！？
もうッ！！

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_LINAMEWRILAH_000_215<tab>Can you believe this? We're right back to where we started! Principal Jenomis will not be pleased.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_LINAMEWRILAH_000_215仕方ないですね……。
あたしたちも劇場艇へ戻るとしましょうか……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_LINAMEWRILAH_500_050<tab>
target: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_LINAMEWRILAH_500_050<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_300<tab>If it is as you say, it is most unfortunate. But, I suppose we did everything in our power, and that is all one could ask.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_300それは残念なことになったね……。
だが、それぞれの言い分も理解できるというもの。
当事者ではない我々に為す術はないだろう。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_301<tab>I still do not understand. Why would Lady Fran send <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> on this wild paissa chase if she knew from the start it would be for naught?
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_301それにしても、「レンテの涙」の幹部、フランさんは何故、
断られるとわかっていて無理な要求をしたのでしょうね？

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_LINAMEWRILAH_000_302<tab>Bwagi mentioned something about Fran proving a point to their leader...whomever that may be.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_LINAMEWRILAH_000_302もともとは「レンテの涙」のリーダーからの要求のようで、
それをフランさんが無礙にできなかったって、
そうブワジさんは言ってたわよ。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_303<tab>People in positions of power can prove both naive and stubborn creatures. Simply telling a leader she is wrong may not convince her of the fact. Seeing one's own plan fail, however, is oft the best medicine.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_303どうやら「レンテの涙」のリーダーは純粋な人のようだな……。
悪く言えば、世間慣れしていない「甘さ」を残す人なんだろう。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_LINAMEWRILAH_000_304<tab>Naive <var 1A 02 /var>and<var 1A 01 /var> stubborn? Then the resistance is doomed!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_LINAMEWRILAH_000_304そんな……！
そんな人がリーダーだなんて……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_MONTBLANC_000_305<tab>If a person as imposing as Fran is taking orders from her, then chances are this “leader” is even worse, kupo!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_MONTBLANC_000_305ウ～ン、モグが見た限り、フランさんはとても冷静な人クポ。
しかも、ちょっと怖いぐらいに厳しいクポ……。
そんなフランさんが従うなんて、リーダーはもっと怖い人クポ！

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_306<tab>I would not be so certain, Montblanc.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_306それは逆じゃないかな……むしろ若く幼い？
フランさんはそのリーダーをとても大切にしているのだろうね。
だから、無茶だとわかっていても命令に従った……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_307<tab>My guess is that the individual in question is still quite young and inexperienced, and that Lady Fran is trying to teach her to be an effective leader through example.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_307そうだな、教育の意味もあったんじゃないのかな。
ただ反論しても……たとえその反論が正しいものだとしても、
経験の浅い者は納得がいかない……経験がないからね。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_308<tab>By allowing her to make her own mistakes, Fran is granting her the ability to learn and grow from them─an experience that will ultimately benefit her when the time comes to make some truly difficult decisions.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_308素直に言うことの聞く若者ならば、それはそれでよし。
だが、たとえ反抗的であっても、反省を反省として受け入れる、
そんな若者ならばリーダーとしての資質はあるはずだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_309<tab>Now, I seem to recall reading that one of the many faces of the resistance before the recent quelling was a young girl of royal blood. Do you suppose─
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_309……そういえば、レジスタンスを率いるリーダーのひとりが、
ダルマスカ王家の血筋を引く若者だという噂を耳にした……。
もし、その若者が「レンテの涙」のリーダーだとしたら……？

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_FRAN_000_310<tab>(-???-)You may cease with your baseless presumptions, defector.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_FRAN_000_310(-？？？？-)無粋な妄想はそこまでにしてもらおうか、
亡命ガレアン人の劇作家よ。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_BWAGI_000_311<tab>The door was open.
target: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_BWAGI_000_311<tab>(-ブワジ-)悪リィな……勝手に入らせてもらっタゼ。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_312<tab>And you would be?
target: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_312<tab>あ、あなたが……フランさん……？

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_FRAN_000_313<tab><var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> would be here on orders from the leader of Lente's Tears. Against my better judgment, mind you.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_FRAN_000_313いかにも、我が名はフラン。
「レンテの涙」のリーダーの命に従い、参上した。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_314<tab>Greetings. Lady Fran, I presume? I am Jenomis cen Lexentale, principal of the Majestic Theater Company. You and your colleagues are most welcome on the <var 1A 02 /var>Prima Vista<var 1A 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_314はじめまして、フラン殿。
私がこの劇場艇の主、ジェノミス・レクセンテールです。
我々「劇団マジェスティック」は貴女を歓迎します。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_315<tab>What is it your leader would have of us?
target: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_315<tab>命に従い……と申されたが、それはどういう意味ですかな？

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_FRAN_000_316<tab>While you failed in meeting even a single of our demands, she recognizes that you were sincere in your attempts to see them fulfilled, and for that effort, you are to be...compensated.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_FRAN_000_316……我らの要求は、残念ながら実ることはなかったが、
貴殿らの努力について我らも報いねばなるまい……。
それが我が主の命である。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_317<tab>That is most generous.
target: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_317<tab>では、その厚意に甘えて、フラン殿のご意見を伺おうか。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_FRAN_000_318<tab>The ruins which you seek are hidden behind a waterfall here─a point roughly equidistant from the river's source and its delta.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_FRAN_000_318……であれば、目当てのオーボンヌ修道院とやらは、
ゼイレキレ大河の中程の滝に隠された遺跡……
おそらく、この遺跡だと考えます。

source:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_319You have our thanks, Lady Fran. We will not forget this kindness.
Father, I shall plot a course immediately.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_319ありがとうございます、フランさん。
ご協力に感謝致します！
さぁ、父さん、早速、劇場艇を移動させましょう！

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_ALMALEXENTALE_000_320<tab>Ramza... What is going on here?
target: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_ALMALEXENTALE_000_320<tab>兄さん、これはいったい……？

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_321<tab>Alma! You should be in bed!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_321アルマ！？
大丈夫なのか？　寝てないと……？

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_ALMALEXENTALE_000_322<tab>I've slept enough, Brother. Tell me, who are our guests?
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_ALMALEXENTALE_000_322もう大丈夫、気分はよくなったわ。
私のことより…………

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_BWAGI_000_323<tab>It appears you once again prepare a leap into danger's maw. Keep your wits about you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Lady Fran is strong...but then again, so was Ba'Gamnan.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_BWAGI_000_323(-ブワジ-)ナンていうか……とにかく、姐さんには気をつけてクレ。
オ、オレは……いや、バッガモナン兄貴の二の舞は……
そう……避けるべきダ！

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_BWAGI_000_324<tab>Ah...if you'll excuse me─
target: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_BWAGI_000_324<tab>(-ブワジ-)ア……す、すまネェ、今のは忘れてクンロ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_325<tab>Are you mad!? A trip to the surface in your condition!?
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_325正気か、アルマ、同行するだって！？
……具合の悪いおまえを連れて行けるわけないだろう！？

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_ALMALEXENTALE_000_326<tab>Listen to me, Brother. The High Seraph beckons. She speaks to me through the Otius.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_ALMALEXENTALE_000_326聞いて、兄さん……。
聖天使アルテマが私を呼んでいるの……。
聖石オティスを通じて……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_327<tab>The what!?
target: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_327<tab>な、ナニィッ！！？？？

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_ALMALEXENTALE_000_328<tab>There is no need to worry. Mikoto and I have already devised a plan. I can help clear our family name!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_ALMALEXENTALE_000_328大丈夫、すでにミコトさんと相談して策を講じたわ。
兄さんは一族の汚名を雪ぎたいのでしょ？
なら、私にも手伝いをさせて！

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_329<tab>The Sharlayan has no say in this. I am your father and I insist you remain here on the airship! What would your mother say if I allowed aught to befall you!?
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_329バカなことを言うな！
おまえに何かあったら、死んだ母さんになんと言えばいいッ？
大人しくここにいなさい、アルマッ！

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_ALMALEXENTALE_000_330<tab>Mother? That is what this is all about, isn't it!? What it has always been about! You care not about Ivalice or the Orran name. No, you only seek to use the auracite to bring Mother back!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_ALMALEXENTALE_000_330嘘よ、父さん、嘘を言わないで！
父さんの本当の望みはオーランの雪辱を果たしたいからじゃない！
聖石の力を使って、母さんを蘇らせること！！

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_ALMALEXENTALE_000_331<tab>But you haven't been able to do that. You still do not understand how exactly it is that the shards translate one's desires into reality. That is where I can help. I can ask the High Seraph. It is she who created the auracite.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_ALMALEXENTALE_000_331母さんを蘇らせるには「正しき願い」が必要、
だけど、その願いをどうやって伝えたらよいかはわからない。
でも、聖石を生み出す聖天使アルテマならそれを知ってる！

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_ALMALEXENTALE_000_332<tab>Ultima has bid me come to her place of imprisonment. If we free her, she will reveal unto us the secrets of her creations!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_ALMALEXENTALE_000_332だったら、私を利用して！
聖石オティスを通じて聖天使アルテマは私を呼んでいる、
彼女が封印されし地へ、来いと……！

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_333<tab>Do you hear what you are saying, Alma! Even if there was the slightest chance of bringing Mother back, we cannot risk your life in doing so!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_333そんな二択、選ぶ必要もない！
死んだ者より、生きている者が大切に決まっている！
そうでしょ、父さんッ！！

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_334<tab>Your brother is right! We have sacrificed too much already! I cannot bear the thought of losing you! Either of you!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_334私が間違っていたよ、アルマ！
ラムザの言うとおりだ！
私にはおまえたちが必要だ、失いたくはない！

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_ALMALEXENTALE_000_335<tab>It is too late!
target: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_ALMALEXENTALE_000_335<tab>ダガ、モウ遅イッ！

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_ALMALEXENTALE_000_336<tab>(-Ominous Voice-)I'm so lonely, Father. Why must you love Ramza more than you do me?
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_ALMALEXENTALE_000_336(-禍々しい声-)……寂シイヨ、父サン。
私ヲ見テ……私ハ……ココニ……イルノニ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_MIKOTO_000_337<tab>Do not be cozened by your daughter's words, for they are not her own.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_MIKOTO_000_337騙されてはいけませんッ！
それは聖石オティスの言葉……オティスが言わせているのです！

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_ALMALEXENTALE_000_338<tab>Help...me...Ramz─
target: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_ALMALEXENTALE_000_338<tab>……兄さんッ……助け……てッ！

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_339<tab>Alma!!!
target: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_339<tab>アルマッ！！！

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_340<tab>No! No!
target: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_340<tab>クソッ！！　クソォッ！！！

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_FRAN_000_341<tab>Gods forfend...
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_FRAN_000_341こ、これが伝説の聖石の力……？
なんと禍々しい……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_BWAGI_000_342<tab>I told you. No one can control the power within those shards. No one!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_BWAGI_000_342(-ブワジ-)姐さん、だから言ッたじゃネェか！
ヒトがコントロールできるシロモンじゃネェッテ！！

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_MIKOTO_000_343<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Here, take this. It might be the only thing that can save Alma, but we must hurry to the monastery!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_MIKOTO_000_343これを、これを持って、早くオーボンヌ修道院へ！
アルマさんを……アルマさんを助け出してくださいッ！！

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_344<tab>Come. We leave for the Golmore Jungle...now.
target: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_344<tab>急ぎましょう、ゴルモア大密林へ！！

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_FRAN_500_060<tab>Was the power I sensed beyond the rift─ Was <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var> the High Seraph?
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_FRAN_500_060あれが……聖石の力……？
いや、穴の向こうから感じたあのおぞましいエーテルは……
あれこそが……災いの元凶たる殺戮の天使だというのか……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_MONTBLANC_500_065<tab>What do we do!? What do we do!? We cannot just leave poor Alma to become one of those...one of those...<var 1A 02 /var>monsters<var 1A 01 /var>, kupo!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_MONTBLANC_500_065たいへんだクポ～～ッ！　たいへんだクポ～～ッ！
アルマたんが……未来のモグの嫁が連れ去られたクポ～～ッ！
助けに行くクポ！　絶対に助け出すクポッ！！

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_HURDY_500_070<tab>I think we saw enough to prove that Ultima is no angel, kupo. But if she's not...then what <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> she!?
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_HURDY_500_070怖いクポ～～ッ！　怖いクポ～～ッ！
とてつもなく禍々しく強力なエーテルを感じたクポ！
ゲートの向こう側から溢れるエーテルは邪悪な感じクポ～ッ！

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_JENOMISLEXENTALE_500_075<tab>I've been such a fool...and now I've lost my daughter. Will you ever forgive me, Tia?
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_JENOMISLEXENTALE_500_075……な……なんということだ。
アルマが……アルマが……アルテマにさらわれてしまった？
おお……おお……私はなんと愚かな男なのだ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_LINAMEWRILAH_500_080<tab>I cannot believe what I just witnessed... I won't believe it. I won't. There. It didn't happen.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_LINAMEWRILAH_500_080い、今のはいったい……？
アルマちゃんは……アルマちゃんはどこへ？？
ふ、ふ、震えが……止まりません……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_00543_MIKOTO_500_085<tab>I have good news and bad news, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. The bad news is that it appears the High Seraph was able to employ the Otius as a catalyst to propel her magicks beyond whatever seal she is trapped behind. The good news is, this means my device should function as intended.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_00543_MIKOTO_500_085まさかアルテマ自らが魔力を行使するなんて……想定外でした。
ですが、聖石オティスを触媒としてゲートを開いたということは、
この魔道具が役に立つはずです……！

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_00543_MIKOTO_500_086<tab>Its design is based off of one of Moenbryda's. It repurposes the logic behind her aetheric siphon into a means of disrupting aetherflow by reversing common wavelengths and─
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_00543_MIKOTO_500_086この魔道具はムーンブリダ先輩が残した設計図……
エーテルエクストラクターの原理を利用して作った妨害装置です。
特定のエーテル波長に対して反対の位相をぶつけることで……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_00543_MIKOTO_500_087<tab>And let us just say it has already been calibrated to match the energy emitted by the Otius. As long as Ultima continues to wield the Otius, we should be able to interfere.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_00543_MIKOTO_500_087こ、細かい原理はともかく、
このエーテルジャマーはオティスに波長を合わせてあります。
アルテマがオティスを利用している限り有効なはず……！

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_00543_MIKOTO_500_088<tab>But it only works if we can find Alma. Which is why we must make haste.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_00543_MIKOTO_500_088これを持って、早くオーボンヌ修道院へ！
アルマさんを……アルマさんを助け出してくださいッ！！

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_GIJUK_500_090<tab>What happened here? Is everything alright?
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_GIJUK_500_090ビックリしたゼ、急に姐さんがここへやってくるんだもんナ！
……って……アン？　何かあったのかイ？
顔色が悪いゼ……？

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_RINOK_500_095<tab>Don't tell me... I can see it in your eyes. The auracite claimed another victim. You were fools to think you'd fare any better than Ba'Gamnan. Fools, all of you.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_RINOK_500_095どうしたンだい？　血相変えテ……？
黙ってないでナンとかお言いヨ！？
まさか、ブワジに何かしたンじゃないでショウネ！？

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_BWAGI_500_100<tab>I told her. I told her this was a mistake, and now look what has happened. If you were wise, you'd toss all the remaining shards into Hells' Lid and cut your losses. But you've no more wisdom than Ba'Gamnan. And that's why the High Seraph has already won.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_BWAGI_500_100……やはり聖石なんかに手を出すべきじゃネェンだ！
バッガモナン兄貴がああなっチマったのも、すべて聖石のせい。
なんとかしネェとな……あの聖石をヨォ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_380<tab>Have I your permission to depart, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!? Every moment we tarry here, my sister, she─!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_380準備はできてますよねッ？
ゴルモア大密林へ劇場艇を移動させますッ！！

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_Q1_000_000<tab>何と答える？

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_A1_000_001<tab>Of course, Ramza.
target: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_A1_000_001<tab>承知した！　ゴルモア大密林へ出発しよう！

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_A1_000_002<tab>Now is not the best of times.
target: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_A1_000_002<tab>まだ準備が整っていないようだ、しばし待たれよ！

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_390<tab>Then hold on. I've set engines to full speed!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_390ハイッ、急いで出発しましょう！
劇場艇プリマビスタ、発進ッ！！

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_395<tab>No, it is the worst of times! I beg of you. Do not ask me to wait any longer. For Alma's sake.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_395……わかりました。
準備ができたら声を掛けてくださいねッ。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_FRAN_000_450<tab>Welcome to the land of my people. 'Twould be a poor lie if I said I did not miss it some.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_FRAN_000_450この鬱蒼としたジャングルが我が故郷……。
いや、故郷をとうに捨てた私が懐かしむのは違うか……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_451<tab>Alma!
target: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_451<tab>アルマッ！！

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_ALMALEXENTALE_000_452<tab>Ramza... Help...me...
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_ALMALEXENTALE_000_452……に、兄さん、
……お願い……助け……て……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_453<tab>Alma!!!
target: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_453<tab>アルマァァァァァッ！！

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_454<tab>Begone!
target: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_454<tab>「魔」よ、去れッ！！！

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_LINAMEWRILAH_000_455<tab>Alma! Ramza!
target: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_LINAMEWRILAH_000_455<tab>アルマちゃん！！　ラムザくん！！

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_ALMALEXENTALE_000_456<tab>(-Ominous Voice-)Blood...of the invokers... Fulfill...the ancient covenant...and grant unto me...the vessel...promised.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_ALMALEXENTALE_000_456(-禍々しい声-)我ヲ……召喚セシ者ノ……末裔ヨ………
古ノ契約ニ則リ……ソノ身ヲ憑代トシテ……差シ出スノダ……！

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_LINAMEWRILAH_000_457<tab>What just─!?
target: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_LINAMEWRILAH_000_457<tab>そんなッ！！

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_FRAN_000_458<tab>Bwagi, to me! The girl is not well!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_FRAN_000_458……手当てしないと！
ブワジ、手を貸せッ！

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_MONTBLANC_000_459<tab>Uh, might I suggest we continue this back at the <var 1A 02 /var>Prima Vista<var 1A 01 /var>, kupo!?
target: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_MONTBLANC_000_459<tab>す、すぐに劇場艇へ戻るクポ！！

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_RAMZABEOULVE_000_460<tab>(-Unknown Voice-)Have you the courage to face true evil?
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_RAMZABEOULVE_000_460(-正体不明の若者-)覚悟はあるか……？
禍々しき者を倒すその力を持っているか……？

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_MONTBLANC_000_461<tab>What are you gawping at!? The ship is <var 1A 02 /var>this<var 1A 01 /var> way, kupo!
target: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_MONTBLANC_000_461<tab>何やってるクポ！　急ぐクポ！！

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_GIJUK_500_110<tab>If you need help finding Ramza, do not hesitate to ask. We are here to help. It is what Ba'Gamnan would have wanted.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_GIJUK_500_110エエ？　そんなことがあったのカイ？
オレも手助けするからサ、助けに行こうゼ！
バッガモナン兄貴もそれを願ってるはずダ！

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_RINOK_500_115<tab>Is the boy's father well? I cannot imagine what he is going through. Losing his daughter, only to lose his son moments after her return...
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_RINOK_500_115……そりゃ、ジェノミスとかいう髭のおっさんも心配だろうネェ。
アタイの息子がそんなになったら、
心配で心配で鱗が白くなり剥がれちまうヨ……ああ、嫌だネェ。

source: TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_500<tab>Now Ramza is gone? Oh, dearest Tia, what have I done? What have I done!?
target:
TEXT_STMBDI302_03188_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_500なんだって！？　今度は、ラムザが行方不明？？
あぁ……なんということだ……。
